## Data Setup

```{r setup, message=FALSE}
#| code-fold: show

library(scda)
library(dplyr)
library(tern)
library(stringr)

adpp <- synthetic_cdisc_dataset("latest", "adpp")
adpp <- adpp %>% filter(AVISIT == "CYCLE 1 DAY 1", str_detect(tolower(PARAM), regex("norm by dose", ignore_case = TRUE)))
```
